name: Lily's Clone of Rage
description:
Platform through various locations and collect flowers, to open the towers and find Lily and her clone of rage.

Lily's Clone of Rage is a short 3d platformer, with 2d graphics for characters. The game is about 30 - 45 minutes long, and will provide some fun platforming challenges, exploration and collectable items, epic boss fights with the tower keepers, a flying cow, and maybe even a secret area? 

The music for the game was made by PeriTune (find them on YouTube).

Thank you for playing!
